welcome:
🐾 Welcome to AI Pet Video!

I'll help you create amazing AI-generated videos with your pet photos.

Choose your language:
welcome_back:
🐾 Welcome back, {name}!

What would you like to do?
help_text:
❓ How to use AI Pet Video Bot:

1️⃣ Send 1-10 photos of your pet
2️⃣ Optionally describe the desired video
3️⃣ Pay with Telegram Stars
4️⃣ Wait for your AI-generated video

💰 Price: {price} stars per video
⏱️ Processing time: ~10 minutes per request in queue

Need help? Contact @Yan_Zink
